John Pike , director of a virginia-based military research group, noted that russia suffers from endemic draft avoidance and that 9 out of 10 of eligible draftees escape service: if you've got 90 percent draft evasion, those who show up are just too stupid to evade it. imagine the kind of military you can make out of that. an article in an estonian newspaper in 2007 quoted a russian officer as saying that "we lack armaments, and the weapons we do have don't

chiefs' captain Pontsho Moloi was dismissed for dissent in the 75th minute after complaining of a yellow card given to Michael Mogaladi . yesterday, mogomotsi said that until Pontsho Moloi 's red card, bondo had handled the game well. it is not all about this weekend. bondo has always been a nightmare when handling our games. there is no doubt that he likes flashing cards during games. last season, he flashed a red card in every game he handled involving us, a concerned mogomotsi told mmegi sport. the voluble communications manager believes that as a captain, Pontsho Moloi had every right to engage bondo when he( Pontsho Moloi ) was not happy about the decisions taken by the referee.
